summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 12 February to end of Saturday 12 February GMT
description: Saturday should be dry, bright and breezy for many. However, cloud and outbreaks of rain will arrive from the west by the evening. Winds freshening. Temperatures will remain near normal. Little by way of imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
